title: Banned by riot for defending my Race against racist people
body:
Here is the transcript they sent me showing my toxic behavior and why i was permanently banned. Lets take a vote was I toxic here:?

dude tryn is up here none stop can you pls gank me man wtf
wow team thnx for fucking me
im done
bot
can you help us at all
wtf
reported man
i tried but no one helped me
dude there are two of you and one of him
and you have done nothign
no i dont and you used a racial slurr so you are reported anyways
ok I have a turret down i took solo what have you done
rek LOL why did you leave me lol
i was like he got my back
and then you left LOL
nah i took him down to no health
wow bot lane that farm is legit adc
loving it
ROFL you arent doing anything of value for the team
how did they not kill me i bug splatted
gj bot lane
i won lane
that shows how little the understand the game
i was not even playing tryn he is the jungle
ROFL they dont even know the lanes
look at them run
ROFL
holy shit he is fed
he is one item out of full build
and you guys should base or he will solo the win
usless LOL
yeah keep using that word
enjoy your ban
have not said one thing negative
that word is why our culture wont be takin seriously for a long time
because people of our race use words that are ridiculous
and your attitude is why we will never stop racism
and why we educated and well to do african americans wont ever get the respect we deserve
then go back to your poor neighborhoods and gang banging because some of us are decent people who have earned respect
and all you do is kill the movement the rest of us have worked so hard for

replies.body:
I do not believe you were banned for what you claim to have been banned for. The ban looks to be for your negative and aggressive chat, particularly the insults.

That being said, I hope that action is taken concerning the other player as well.
please highlight the insults for me

> dude tryn is up here none stop can you pls gank me man wtf
wow team thnx for fucking me
im done
reported man
and you have done nothign
no i dont and you used a racial slurr so you are reported anyways
ROFL you arent doing anything of value for the team
that shows how little the understand the game
usless LOL
have not said one thing negative

there you go, all your situations of complaining toward your team.


EDIT !IMPORTANT I DO NOT HAVE AN OPINION ON THIS BAN, I AM JUST GUESSING WHAT MIGHT HAVE GOTTEN YOU BANNED, PLEASE DON'T CONSIDER THIS MY PERSONAL OPINION, IT IS JUST A ROUGH ESTIMATION !
I too hate when orcs attack humanity. The elves though are case by case.
Our race does not need to be defended from online trolls dude. Mute and report em, save the righteous indignation for real life.

No, you were banned for belittling your teammates and overall being negative. Seriously, you don't think calling people "useless" is negative? Also...


> [{quoted}](name=ReverenDick,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4HI3UVlJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-05T08:05:32.967+0000)
> enjoy your ban

Classic.
actually the useless was attacking myself for spawning the rift herald on accident and she did nothing. I said enjoy your ban because they kept calling me the n word.

1. I was finding it funny because of the irony of the situation.
2. Okay, here's some other lines for you to defend


> [{quoted}](name=ReverenDick,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4HI3UVlJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-05T08:05:32.967+0000)
> dude tryn is up here none stop can you pls gank me man wtf
> wow team thnx for fucking me
> im done
> ok I have a turret down i took solo what have you done
> ROFL you arent doing anything of value for the team

To be fair, most of the rest of the chat logs is you being a passive aggressive jerk to the rest of your team and berating them the entire time so....

> [{quoted}](name=LukeTheSheppy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4HI3UVlJ,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-10-05T08:22:06.351+0000)
>
> 1. I was finding it funny because of the irony of the situation.
> 2. Okay, here's some other lines for you to defend
> 
> To be fair, most of the rest of the chat logs is you being a passive aggressive jerk to the rest of your team and berating them the entire time

So calling me a jerk is showing me how to act right?
I'm not here to show you how to act, and at no point did I claim to do so.

I agree league needs to crack down on the racial slurs because they are both over used and hurtful also just so happens  the most used is the n word which is very insulting . I think the other player deserves the same punishment you received because just like you they too broke a rule . Overall i think you deserve your ban but** i think its important you understand that you weren't banned for defending your race, You were banned for having a negative attitude that impacted the rest of your teammates in a negative** way next time i suggest biting the bullet and reporting at the end of game.


{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

>enjoy your ban

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

The fact you were banned, for your clearly aggressive negative behavior, indicates you likely have already had several previous warnings, due to the same behavior. Riot isn't going to ban you after one offense. So I am pretty sure this was just a "last straw" scenario that lead to your being banned, just as I am sure the other parties involved, especially those using the racial slurs, got at least warnings if not chat bans.

Bottom line, no room for toxic or negative behavior, especially in chat.

> [{quoted}](name=Legendinabox,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4HI3UVlJ,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-10-05T15:06:47.221+0000)
>
> The fact you were banned, for your clearly aggressive negative behavior, indicates you likely have already had several previous warnings, due to the same behavior. Riot isn't going to ban you after one offense. So I am pretty sure this was just a "last straw" scenario that lead to your being banned, just as I am sure the other parties involved, especially those using the racial slurs, got at least warnings if not chat bans.
> 
> Bottom line, no room for toxic or negative behavior, especially in chat.

So chat ban for them while I get perm banned.  Makes loads of sense.

> [{quoted}](name=ReverenDick,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4HI3UVlJ,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2017-10-06T02:16:25.516+0000)
>
> So chat ban for them while I get perm banned.  Makes loads of sense.

It was likely some of their first offenses or lead to anything up to a 2 week ban. You yourself admitted you were recently off a 2 week ban and continued to exhibit the same behavior that got you banned, hence perma ban. Riot even warns you the next offense is a perma ban. Sucks what they said, but you have no one to blame here but yourself.

Just wanted to update everyone who said i deserve the ban and should accept it. Pls read below and know you were wrong. 


Greetings ReverenDick,

I looked over the 3 games mentioned on the permanent suspension and I wanted to talk about what I noticed in these games.

It looks like during the game you are fine and you are even helpful to players at the beginning of the game, it seems like when something goes wrong in the game then you turn on players in your games including insulting them for their gameplay and this makes the rest of the game turn into quite a negative experience for all involved.

The games mentioned on this banning are negative enough to warrant a permanent suspension especially since you have recently gone through a 2 week suspension and about 2 weeks later this banning occurred. I wanted to give your account one final chance, and I will be applying a final 2 week suspension on your account.

I also wanted to discuss the game where there was quite a bit of hatespeech going on, in this game there were players that were being incredibly toxic to each other and you responded back to them with a response claiming to defend yourself about the use of hatespeech. While I understand the want to explain this to others in the game with a measured response. This is not the place for you to be speaking about this in League. If this happens in the future just mute these players and report them after the game, there is no need to spread the negativity.

Please note that the next negative action on your account will result in a permanent suspension of your account and if it is placed we will not be removing or altering the suspension for any reason whatsoever.

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

(edited out riot employee)
Riot Games Player Support

Youre not "defending" your race.

You just used this as an excuse to lash out and insult other people and stooped down the level of the one insulting you.

This isn't the format that usually accompanies chat logs, as they normally have the user's name and or time stamps.

That being said, you should take into account your punishment history. If you had recently came off a 2 week ban, your next punishment results in a permaban.

Why does everyone who clearly gets banned due to their clearly aggressive chat logs always feel the need to post a "Should I have been banned" thread?

The fact that you had to come up here and ask everyone that after knowing what your chat logs look like show that you've absolutely no clue how you should behave as a player in the LoL community.

In my honest opinion, yes, you **do** deserve the ban.

LukeTheSheppy  was only trying to prove a point he doesn't seem to think that but you asked the community what we think and this is what you get if you do not like what others have to say simply don't make a post like this!

yes i do think its little over board but at the same time! you still where kinda toxic and weather you where defending your self and you're race These words are still looked at even if your a good player and league i have had my share of that but its all about what you say minor or not Riot just is getting harder because tons of people do this at times and not all the time is every one so clean in this game!

ow team thnx for fucking me
im done
can you help us at all
wtf
reported man
dude there are two of you and one of him
and you have done nothign
no i dont and you used a racial slurr so you are reported anyways
ok I have a turret down i took solo what have you done
rek LOL why did you leave me lol
and then you left LOL
ROFL you arent doing anything of value for the team
that shows how little the understand the game
ROFL they dont even know the lanes

Keep in mind the rest of your words where fine but over all those are still consider rude in other person's eye's even if you are not meaning to or not Riot will still take note of that because your attacking some one because they got on your case remember its a game don't be so focused on another player's and don't mention your gonna report them all that does it seem rude because people do that a lot! Saying stuff like to others will make them continue to act that way to make you mad so over all your just playing into what they want just mute them or ignore them it's not really worth the ban IMO!

But yes the others are right attacking your team is no better then that player so keep that in mind Defending you're self or not Riot just wont take it anymore because so many people do this on a daily base! just be more wise when talking in the game!
